    import {RouterHistory} from 'px-mobile/js/router.js'
    public class | source

    RouterHistory

    Extends:

    js/base~BaseClass → RouterHistory

    Router history manages the state of the router. Handles cross-browser history management, based on either pushState and real URLs, or onhashchange and URL fragments. Inspired by http://backbonejs.org/docs/backbone.html#section-196
